girls-special.round1Description: Each participant have to perform one of the pre-decided four 'Minute to win it' games to get to the second round
girls-special.eventDescription: Try your luck - perform, decode and design
girls-special.name: Kudi Kamaal Di
girls-special.round2Description: Decode the vent with your partner - the team of two girls will cross the parth by remembering the different codes to complete it

girls-special.round1Description: Participants will have to solve a crossword puzzle using the given clues
girls-special.eventDescription: Solve crossword show your creative skills and see whats left out!Q
girls-special.name: Dhinchak Damsells
girls-special.round2Description: Participants will have to show their creative skills and do a makeover. There will be a twist

girls-special.round1Description: Participants will have to play Subway Surfers. Participating featuring in the top 20 highest scores will be qualified for the next round.(Mobile handsets will be provided)
girls-special.eventDescription: Surf your way through the hurdles!!
girls-special.name: Subway surfers
girls-special.round2Description: The player with highest score will win.

non-tech.round1Description: Elimination Round
non-tech.name: Treasure Hunt
non-tech.round2Description: Selfie le lein re - Take a selfie with the person after solving the clue
non-tech.round3Description: Surprise

non-tech.round1Description: In this round all members will be given forms which they have to fill it up individually. The form would consist of primary details of their group; like their favorite hanging spot, favorite food place, etc. Judgement would be done on the basis of number of similar answers in all the 3 forms.
non-tech.eventDescription: Get your Gang together & let's see how much you know each other.
non-tech.name: My Gang
non-tech.round3Description: The selected teams will be given a prop, using that prop they will have to make a Dubsmash video and upload it on Youtube and Facebook in the given time period. Based on the number of likes and views judgement will be done.
non-tech.round2Description: The selected team will be given the name of a product, they'll have to prepare the Advertisement for the product given in the allotted time. Uniqueness of the Ad. will be the deciding factor.

non-tech.round1Description: A quiz based on "Know your city". Questions in the quiz would be related to Anand/VVN.
non-tech.eventDescription: Wanna check how much you know about VVN/Anand?? Than let's do some velagiri..!
non-tech.name: The Vela
non-tech.round3Description: It will be a surprise round based on Physical, co-ordination and Strategical tasks.
non-tech.round2Description: It is a Bathroom singing round. The participants have to sing as long as they can, certain acts would be allotted which they have to do it while singing. Once they stop, they are out. How you sing is not important here but how long you sing is important. Time will be a major factor for judging in this round.

non-tech.round1Description: Its a quiz round. Questions would be related to few of the TV series like FRIENDS, GOT, BBT, BLACKLIST, SUITS, ARROW, etc..
non-tech.eventDescription: Friends, GOT, BBT, Suits, Blacklist, etc etc..!!
non-tech.name: The Cocktail
non-tech.round3Description: Two teams will be combined to form a single team. Each participant will be given a character which he/she has to enact and a common situation will be given to the team. All participants will enact their character and judging will be done on the basis of their similarity to the original character.
non-tech.round2Description: Its a Dumb-charades round. All the participants would be assigned a partner. Now the game would follow in a team of 2. One team member will be given a character from the TV series and will have to enact the same, the other team member will have to identify that character.

non-tech.eventDescription: NFS, CS, FIFA!! The game, Mrs Hudson, is On!!
non-tech.name: LAN

non-tech.round1Description: Candidates have to find connected images from three different places using the given clue.
non-tech.eventDescription: Trust the dots, everything is intentional.
non-tech.name: Connect the Dots
non-tech.round2Description: Person will be taken to a place outside BVM where they will be given an amount of rupees to get back to college with maximum money.
non-tech.round3Description:
In this LUDO game is played. Three photos will be given during game, they have to identified persons
ask the set of question, and find odd one out from answers.

non-tech.round1Description: Quiz based on general knowledge, aptitude, and common sense.
non-tech.eventDescription: Jack of all trades, Master of none.
non-tech.name: Bid the best
non-tech.round2Description: Story making by using photos.
non-tech.round3Description: Bidding on pictures and making ad using those pictures.

non-tech.round1Description: Elimination round based on puzzle, matches, rectifying errors, etc
non-tech.eventDescription: Partners in crime, passion in rhymes!
non-tech.name: Partners in Crime
non-tech.round2Description: Clue to pathway leads to crossword which leads to logical questions.
non-tech.round3Description: Break the prison

non-tech.round1Description: It is a virtual online stock exchange game wherein participants will be provided with virtual money. They can use that money for trading the stocks. The event will be kept online for 2 days. The participant with the highest amount will be the winner.
non-tech.eventDescription: Be the wolf and win the Oscar..!!
non-tech.name: Wallstreet

non-tech.round1Description: Quiz which contains logical questions, brain teasers, and questions based on logos and general knowledge.
non-tech.eventDescription: Solve the clues!
non-tech.name: Far away fast
non-tech.round3Description: Solve clues and find the final place in the campus.
non-tech.round2Description: Participants will have to take selfies at specified places in the college campus.

non-tech.round1Description: Participants will be paired, given time to get to know each other. They will then have to fill a form which has questions about each other.
non-tech.eventDescription: Find a Friend and Join the Trend!
non-tech.name: Let us be Friends
non-tech.round3Description: Surprise Round.
non-tech.round2Description: One team member will have to guide the other on a specific path.

non-tech.round1Description: Logical quiz (written) will be given to one team member while the remaining team members will be given two physical tasks.
non-tech.eventDescription: Explore the college and show that you are the only one!
non-tech.name: SOTY
non-tech.round3Description: Surprise Round.
non-tech.round2Description: The selected teams will  given three tasks: Eating, Running, Cycling.

non-tech.round1Description: Quiz Based on Game Of Thrones.
non-tech.eventDescription: Conquer the Iron Throne!
non-tech.name: Valar Morghulis
non-tech.round3Description: Teams will be sorted into different Houses and they will then have to prove their worth by conquering the Iron Throne
non-tech.round2Description: Audio-Visual quiz.

non-tech.round1Description:
Round 1 will consist of two parts.
- Part 1: Participants will have to submit their Fantasy Team of 5 players from the teams who are playing their first semi-final of ICC T20 World Cup 2016. This must be done before the semifinal begins. Participants will receive points according to the real-life performance of the players in their team. They will also have to select a captain whose performance points will be doubled
Part 2: A quiz based on cricket will be taken
non-tech.eventDescription: Bid for the best
non-tech.name: Cricket Fantasy
non-tech.round2Description:
Shortlisted teams will then have to submit an 11 player fantasy team by selecting players both the teams playing 2nd semifinal.
Teams will receive points according to the rules established before
non-tech.round3Description:
Finalists will be given a fixed budget and they will have to for a team by biding from a given list of players. Your team must consist of:
		At least 4 Batsmen
		At least 1 All Rounder
		1 Wicketkeeper
		At least 2 Bowlers

non-tech.round1Description: We will give one ball and two balloons to each team. They have to take that ball at specified place with the help of balloons.
non-tech.eventDescription: Survival of the fittest
non-tech.name: Tackeshi's castle
non-tech.round2Description: Surprise round
non-tech.round3Description: surprise round and they have to perform a task

non-tech.round1Description:
Spell-bee:-
             8 pronunciations will be given to each group and time limit 2 minutes.(10)points will be awarded to each correct answer.
non-tech.eventDescription: Connect the dots
non-tech.name: Mind Mystery
non-tech.round2Description:
Video Graphy:-
Only one question will be asked after one video. Time limit to give the answer is 2 minute. Correct answer 20 awarded, Wrong answer 10 deducted.
non-tech.round3Description:
Clue round:-
 Three clues will be given with varying difficulty level

non-tech.round1Description: A list of 25 to 30 items, which are to be collected by the participants.
non-tech.eventDescription: Run for fun
non-tech.name: Finding Funny
non-tech.round2Description: They have to take a selfie with the specified things, person ,etc
non-tech.round3Description: We will give a map of BVM in a different way and they have to solve that and perform specified task.

non-tech.round1Description: Quiz based on mental ability and PPDT (Picture Perception and Discussion Test).
non-tech.eventDescription: want be an officer? Be ready cadets. There is a chance for you.
non-tech.name: SSB
non-tech.round2Description: Group tasks on set-up provided by the organizers.
non-tech.round3Description: Conference interview in front of panel of 7 to 8 jury members.

non-tech.round1Description: Participants will be divided in 3 groups (Ruling party, Opposition party, Decision Making party) and parliamentary style debate has to be done and bill is to be passed in parliament.
non-tech.eventDescription: Let's be leaders of tomorrow. Parliament style debate will be conducted.
non-tech.name: Youth Parliament
non-tech.round2Description: Debate between both winning parties for and against the topic (for both).

non-tech.eventDescription:
Cricket full of funny, weird amazing brain storming rules.
Cricket with weird amazing rules like gully cricket will be played. 
4 players/team and overs: 4
non-tech.name: Crazy cricket

non-tech.eventDescription:
Not everything can be achieved in a minute except few. Can you?
Interesting tasks are to be completed by the participants in one minute.
non-tech.name: Win it in minute

non-tech.round1Description: Quiz based on Mathematics, General Mathematical Knowledge, General Knowledge.
non-tech.eventDescription: Discover the Aryabhatta within you. Come play!
non-tech.name: Aryabhatta
non-tech.round3Description: Surprise.
non-tech.round2Description: Participants will have to answer mathematical questions while performing any given activity.

non-tech.round1Description: Quiz based on Logical Reasoning and Verbal Ability.
non-tech.eventDescription: Two makes company. Three makes a winning team!
non-tech.name: Triothalon
non-tech.round3Description: Surprise.
non-tech.round2Description: Clue Hunt which includes performing various tasks at the location pointed by the clue.

non-tech.round1Description: Team will have to perform odd jobs (washing cars, polishing shoes, etc) and the team with the maximum profit will move to the next round.
non-tech.eventDescription: Become a marketing virtuoso. Be the Boss. Be the Guru.
non-tech.name: Guru
non-tech.round3Description: Participants will be given a product and they will have to market the product to the panel of a jury as representatives of a company selling the given product.
non-tech.round2Description: Participants will bid on the ongoing events and points will be awarded if their bid wins the event. The teams with maximum winning points will move on to next round.

non-tech.round1Description: Participants will have to complete a given task and Team Captains will be chosen according to their performances.
non-tech.eventDescription: Is this a Highway to Hell or the Stairway to Heaven?
non-tech.name: Roadies
non-tech.round3Description: Group Discussions will be conducted among the teams and finalists for Personal Interview round will be shortlisted based on their performance.
non-tech.round2Description: Teams will have to complete a given task.

non-tech.round1Description: Each team will be given a certain amount of virtual money and a clue which will lead them to a place. Each place has two tasks. Teams will have to buy the tasks and complete it. You can only buy ONE task. You can attempt the task only ONCE. Qualifying teams will move to the next round.
non-tech.eventDescription: Can you rise above the evil plot?
non-tech.name: The Dark Secret
non-tech.round3Description: All the qualifying teams will have to complete the given task and unveil the dark secret.
non-tech.round2Description: Team will be divided into two parts. One team member will solve clues in the campus. The other team member will have to solve a clue inside a classroom. The final combined answer of both the clues will point to the final task.

non-tech.round1Description: Quiz based on Sherlock Holmes.
non-tech.eventDescription: Did You Miss Me? Did You Miss Me?
non-tech.name: Sherlock Reloaded
non-tech.round2Description: Crime Scene Investigation. Participants will have to rack their brains and find out the criminal mastermind using their acute logic and sharp observation.

events.round1Description: Elimination round based on the distance covered by car.
events.eventDescription: Every action has a reaction!
events.name: The Thrust
events.round2Description: This round is based on the distance covered by car on a track/path with obstacles and also the design explanation of the model by the participants.

events.round1Description: The participants will have to shoot a pyramid made from plastic glasses.
events.eventDescription: Show the pistol power!
events.name: Sharp Shooter
events.round3Description: The participants will have to shoot a moving target.
events.round2Description: The participants will have to shoot a circular target board.

events.round1Description: Open Book Exam: The subject will be Elements of Mechanical Engineering. (Elements of Mechanical Engineering Book is compulsory.)
events.eventDescription: Mechanical Treasure Hunt!
events.name: Mechchase
events.round3Description: Treasure hunt: The particpants will be given a pictorial puzzle of different places from the campus. They will have to re-arrange the pieces of the puzzle, identify the location and reach their before their competitors do!
events.round2Description: Selected teams will have to solve a riddle which gives them the next clue.

events.round1Description: Quiz related to Fluid Mechanics.
events.eventDescription: Sail in water with your brain!
events.name: Hydrobounze
events.round2Description: Participants will have to prepare a Boat from the material provided by us and check its performance.

events.round1Description: The first session will comprise of an expert talk on CAD.
events.eventDescription: Learn, Practice and Master.
events.name: CAD Mania
events.round3Description: Students will be given models to prepare through the knowledge acquired from the previous sessions.
events.round2Description: The participants will be given time to practice. (1 to 1.5 Hours)

events.round1Description: Automobile Quiz.
events.eventDescription: Ignite the Henry Ford within you!
events.name: Auto Techno
events.round3Description: An automobile problem will be given to the participants and they will have to present their solutions.
events.round2Description: Car Comparison.

events.eventDescription:
Fight your opponent's crane!

Materials:
1. Ice-Cream sticks (maximum 100).
2. Injection (maximum 6).
3. Connecting joints (wooden block, butt, screw)
4. Double Sided Tape.
Note: Use of Electrical or Mechanical parts is NOT allowed.

Robot Specifications:
1. The Robot Arm should move in four directions: Up, Down, Left, Right.
2. Dimensions of the Robot:
        Base: Maximum 25 cm * 25 cm
        Height: 40 to 45 cm
3. Base MUST be made from Ice-Cream sticks.

General Rules:
1. Teams will be disqualified if motion(s) in any direction (Left, Right, Up, Down) are restricted.
2. Fights will be in a One to One manner.
3. Teams will be disqualified if they don't stay inside the confined boundaries.
4. Maximum time for a single fight is 150 seconds. If there is no clear winner, then both the teams will be disqualified.
events.name: Cavador

events.eventDescription:
It's not only how much load you can bear, keeping balance is also important.

Participants will have to build a crane mechanism in 3 hours using popsicle sticks. Thread will be provided for lifting weight. All materials will be provided. The crane which lifts the maximum amount of weight will be the winner.
events.name: Bob The Builder

events.eventDescription:
Shape your idea with clay.
Participants will have to build a soil arch using clay bricks. Bricks are to be made from the clay provided on the first day. On next day, arch is to be built using those bricks. Weights will be kept on the arch for testing purposes and the team which has the highest arch and bears the most waight wins.
events.name: Soil-a-Arch

events.round1Description: Business quiz related to conditions, situations, future changes risks, etc. Related to civil engineering.
events.eventDescription: Whole lot of common sense and civil engineering knowledge will lead you towards higher profit in real estate.
events.name: Real estate
events.round2Description: Teams will be provided with virtual money, using which they are supposed to bid on the different properties shown on map (provided by management) and then different projects will be given like highway proposal, new bridge construction, legal documentation, etc.

events.round1Description: Quiz which contains logical and conceptual questions related to civil basic engineering.
events.eventDescription: Theory to practically. Here CPI is of no concern. How good you are at concept will be checked
events.name: Ignited Minds
events.round2Description: Picture Perception: Famous civil structures will be shown with hints. Teams will have to name the structures.
events.round3Description: Real life problems will be given to the participants and they will have to present an economically feasible and effective solution to the jury.

events.eventDescription:
With candy stick and rope, make a bridge of hope.
Participants will have to build a cable bridge using popsicle sticks and thread. All required materials and dimensions will be provided. The team which produces a bridge which is able to bear the maximum load will be the winner. Time given to the participants would be 3 hours
events.name: Kabelzubia(Bridge)

events.round1Description: Quiz based on general knowledge of famous civil structures and basic surveying.
events.eventDescription: To achieve your goal direction is needed; knowledge is important & implementation is must
events.name: Civil Hunt
events.round2Description: Participants will have to solve clues with the help of surveying instruments.
events.round3Description: Simple geometric shapes will be given to the team and they will have to draw the same on the ground on a larger scale using surveying instruments.

events.round1Description: Quiz on general knowledge of operating system.(ex. Name latest android OS)
events.eventDescription: Know how your PC works!!
events.name: OS Revolution
events.round2Description: open book surprise round.

events.round1Description: Hardware Quiz
events.eventDescription: Equal parts, swagger and smart!!
events.name: Huntware
events.round2Description: Treasure Hunt
events.round3Description: Surprise Round

events.round1Description: Treasure hunt on html/CSS/JavaScript.
events.eventDescription: Bid your tags or pack your bags.
events.name: <TAGS>
events.round2Description: One has to draw picture and team members have to identify the word from picture.
events.round3Description: bidding on tags and web developing.

events.round1Description: Buzzer round on C and C++.
events.eventDescription: Buzz,Code,Distract
events.name: Ultimate Coding Challenge
events.round2Description: Two members will be given two different programs to solve independently. One encryption program needs to be solved by both the team members together.
events.round3Description: Programming at places with distractions.

events.round1Description: Quiz based on Microsoft Windows.
events.eventDescription: Be like Bill
events.name: Office Suite
events.round2Description: Teams will have to debate on technical topics given to them.
events.round3Description:
Tasks based on Windows Office would be given.
Create a newsletter in Word.
Create a poster in PowerPoint.
Create an Excel sheet on the given data.

events.round1Description: Quiz related to programming languages, current affairs and the world of computer.
events.eventDescription: Your troops are ready for battle
events.name: Battle Code
events.round2Description: Teams will have to code a simple program on monitor screens and keyboards which are rotated by 180 degrees.
events.round3Description: 10-15 blocks of code will be given to participants, they have to use those blocks or logic of those blocks and the team to come up with a logical piece of code within minimum time

events.round1Description: there will be technical quiz based on C/C++, basics of IT/CP, crossword, aptitude
events.eventDescription: I am not a geek, I am Technocrat!!
events.name: BAT
events.round2Description: Program will be given in any programming language, participants have to convert it in C/C++ by understanding the logic.
events.round3Description: One member will be given definition and other will play snake & ladder.

events.round1Description: Teams will have to make goals in pits and the team which finishes first will move on to the next round.
events.eventDescription: Let the Bot do the Talk!
events.name: Bot Ball
events.round3Description: Surprise Round.
events.round2Description: Teams will be competing against each other with a number of obstacles on the field. The objective of this round is to get the maximum number of goals.

events.round1Description: Hurdle race. Based on the point table, the teams will qualify for the next round.
events.eventDescription: Battle among the bests! Race On!
events.name: Imperial Race
events.round3Description: Conquering enemy territories. The teams will have to collect flags on a defined course to reach the enemy territory.
events.round2Description: Crossing the maze. 4 teams compete in the maze. The team which finishes first, will be eligible for the next round.

events.round1Description: Technical Quiz.
events.eventDescription: Scarcity engenders ingenuity!
events.name: Crack The Nut
events.round3Description: Hypothetical problem cases will be given. Participants will have to come up with a solution within the given time. Use of internet is not allowed for research.
events.round2Description: Technical Debate between two teams on a given topic. Preparation time will be given. Use of Internet is allowed for research.

events.round1Description: One member gets the code and has to convey it in a given form using laser pointers. The other person, being the receiver decodes the received message. The time taken to decode the message will be noted down and the teams will be short- listed accordingly.
events.eventDescription: Unleash the decoder within you!
events.name: Crazy Code
events.round3Description: Surprise.
events.round2Description: The teams will be given incomplete circuits and the missing components will be placed at different locations. By following the solution of these clues, the circuit will be completed with missing components and the top 5 teams will move to the final rounds. The deciding factor will be time.

events.round1Description: Quiz based on C language and Arduino programming.
events.eventDescription: Programs are fun. So is cryptography. They shouldn't be combined. Or they become a mystery!
events.name: Code-e-Tronics
events.round3Description: Students have to simulate an Arduino program using Proteus.
events.round2Description: Arduino based coding.

events.round1Description: Participants would guess the name of the component or circuits shown on the screen. A total of approximately 30 pictures will be shown. Each picture will be shown for 10 seconds.
events.eventDescription: Interpret the technical language!
events.name: Electro Charades
events.round3Description: Technical Dumb Charades + Wildcard Entry(payable on the day of the event)
events.round2Description: Based on a technical treasure hunt, the participants would solve a crossword puzzle (Across+Down).

events.round1Description: Both participants will individually solve a crossword puzzle and their average scores will be calculated for further shortlisting.
events.eventDescription: Battle of the technical minds!
events.name: Wall-E-Tronics
events.round3Description: Using creativity, they have to purchase components with the points they obtained and implement a circuit using the purchased components.
events.round2Description: Each team will have to answer at least 1 question from the 10 set of different questions of varying difficulty levels. There are points which will be given to the team for each correctly answered question.

events.round1Description: The participating team will be shown a demo of making an Ornithopter. Each team will then make an Ornithopter in the allotted time and judging will based on the time of flight and distance covered (material will be provided)
events.eventDescription: Ornithopter- Learn, Make & Let it fly high.
events.name: Techflight

events.round1Description: It is a screening round, a quiz based on EME, MOS, EG, general knowledge, aptitude, verbal ability, etc.
events.eventDescription: First Answer, then find a Clue & lastly present the Case.
events.name: Pro-mech Hunting
events.round3Description: Participants have to prepare a case study based on clues received in the second round. They will have to present it in the form of detailed representation on the provided sheets to the jury. Jury will then declare the final winner.
events.round2Description: There will be a Treasure Hunt, clues would be Tech and Non-Tech both. The answers they'll get from the clues will have questions for case study in the final round.

events.round1Description: A quiz based on concepts of Reverse Engineering.
events.eventDescription: Be the Phunsukh Wangdu (3 idiots). Re-assemble it & see what's left out.
events.name: Reverse Engineering
events.round2Description: A working toy will be shown to the selected teams. After some time the same toy will be given to the teams in a dissembled form. Their task would be to assemble the toy without any component being left out. A certain time period will be fixed for the task.

events.round1Description: The teams will have to analyze a problem based on principles of physics and will have to predict the reason and justify their answers as per their analysis.
events.eventDescription: Get back to the class of Physics and then go on "ON THE GO MACHINE".
events.name: The Psycho Physicist
events.round2Description: It is based on Goldberg Mechanism. They will have to use the given props and have to create an "ON THE GO MACHINE"  type mechanism.

events.round1Description: Participants will have to study a circuit provided to them and then answer questions besed on it.
events.eventDescription: Diffuse the bomb and steal the diamond
events.name: Crack It
events.round2Description: Teams will have to defuse a bomb which is in form of digital circuit.
events.round3Description: participants will have to stealing the diamond by clearing the Security System

events.round1Description: Quiz with basic questions related to power plants.
events.eventDescription: Prepare yourself for producing energy.
events.name: Power Rangers
events.round2Description: Teams will have to identify the various equipments of the power plant shown in the presentation.
events.round3Description: Endorse yourself and debate with the rest of your power plant.

events.round1Description: Quiz with questions related to electrical machines
events.eventDescription: Be a master and rule the machine.
events.name: The Machinist
events.round2Description: Viva on basic problems of electrical machines.
events.round3Description: Performance of test in electrical laboratories.

events.round1Description: Quiz related to basics of electrical engineering.
events.eventDescription: Illuminate your house by wiring skills.
events.name: Wireman
events.round2Description: Equivalent resistance will be given and participants will have to make a circuit which has total resistance given to them. They will also have to identify the resistance of a resister by using colour codes.
events.round3Description: Teams will have to design a detailed wiring system of a house on a drawing sheet.

events.round1Description: Teams will have to complete a crossword based on Electrical and Basic Electronics questions.
events.eventDescription: Be the pirates of electrica.
events.name: Twisted Electrica
events.round2Description: Treasure hunt
events.round3Description: Based on the points obtained in the first two rounds,teams will be given virtual money. The money will be used to buy components for making a mini-project and then selling it to the jury.

cultural.round1Description:
These are the topics on which you have to submit photos on viewfinder16@gmail.com.
	Topics are:
		1. Black and white.
		2. Fire
		3. Happiness
cultural.eventDescription: A typical Indian Bollywood singing game
cultural.name: View Finder
cultural.round2Description: You have to submit photos that you will take in two days of Udaan'16. Topic will be given

cultural.eventDescription: A typical Indian Bollywood singing game
cultural.name: Antakshari

cultural.eventDescription: It is kind of a Bollywood quiz.
cultural.name: Bolly mix bolly

cultural.round1Description: prepare a dish from given ingredients.
cultural.eventDescription: Cook with given ingredients and sell for maximum profit
cultural.name: Bakers & Sellers
cultural.round2Description: sell it to get highest revenue .

cultural.round1Description: Prepare one out of the given videos.
cultural.eventDescription: Participants have to dub the given video without any vulgar content
cultural.name: Scene-e-magic
cultural.round2Description: Random selection of video from round, about 45 minute will be given.

cultural.round1Description: Participants need to send an audio and a video file as their audition(genre: Bollywood/Western/Classical). Selected participants will be contacted via email. Time limit 2-3 minutes.
cultural.name: Tansing
cultural.round2Description: Live performance of shortlisted participants with one accompanist or karaoke.
